main event: A witness observed a very bright pin-prick size object directly overhead in Beavertown, Ohio, which made rapid, erratic course changes.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 30 minutes,The object was reported to be very bright and small,Observers noted that the object's movements were rapid and erratic,Wind and balloon track data did not indicate any balloons in the area,The report included astro diagrams which disagreed with the position of the object.
sighted object: a very bright pin-prick size object
witness description: A witness who documented the sighting with detailed information.
